amaradewa, nanda malani saha pirisa aadare hithuna - miltan mallawarachchi, anjalin gunathilaka athura supem kakulu dehadak – wiktar rathnayaka, sujatha aththanayaka surangana kelina surangana – rupa indumathi,amitha wadisinha, malani bulathsinhala sarana aran ape munida –abewardhana balasuriya saha pirisa ralin ralata ena – latha walpola, sisira senarathna, miltan mallawaaarachchi, indrani senarathnagitha poth – aananda pothhala - maradananalu niliyan - toni ranasinha, robin pranandu, di. aar. nanayakkara, somasiri dehipitiya, ranjith yayinna, don sirisena, fe්radi silwa, piyadasa wijekon, jastin fonseka, wi. ti. ji. karunarathna, wijitha mallika, nita pranandu, shanni lekha, githa kumarasinha, kusum perera, farinalayi, chandra kaluaarachchi, mahesha wirasinha, liliyan edirisinha, ji. ti. wikramasinha, dayananda gunawardhana, bi. es. perera, di. ech. di. ranasinha, lalitha almeda, harbat kahawitapradarshanaya – elfinstan, oodiyan, impala, athulu palamuwana mandalaye sinama shala 16 ka di pradarshanaya arambaana ladiantan je.
